name: a never ending story
description:
Welcome to Repeat ! The goal of the game is to finish the unending first level, each time there will be a puzzle you will need to find and complete in order to gain a Wisdom Stone wich will need to be carried to the sacred pond. On completion you will unlock a new part of the level and its mysteries, find all the stones to win the game. The path leading to the pond is treacherous , make use of your acrobatic skills !

Crédits: Valentin Bayle, Justin Cruceru, Damien Laverdant

valentin.bayle@epitech.eu, justin.cruceru@epitech.eu, damien.laverdant@epitech.eu
